io.permazen

Interface Session.RetryableAction

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Session.TransactionalAction
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractTransactionRaftCommand.RaftTransactionAction
    Enclosing class:
    Session

    public static interface Session.RetryableAction
extends Session.TransactionalAction
    Tagging interface indicating a Session.TransactionalAction that should be retried if a RetryTransactionException is thrown.
